enterNino.title: What’s your National Insurance number?
enterNino.heading: What’s your National Insurance number?
enterNino.hint: You can find it on your National Insurance card, benefit letters, or official letters about tax. For example, QQ123456C.
enterNino.explanation: We need this to check your eligibility.

enterName.title: What’s your name?
enterName.heading: What’s your name?
enterName.hint: Use the name that is on your official documents, such as passport, driving licence, or any benefit claims
enterName.explanation: We need this to confirm your identity and eligibility. Your name will also appear on your prepaid card.

enterDob.title: What’s your date of birth?
enterDob.heading: What’s your date of birth?
enterDob.explanation: We need this to confirm your identity and eligibility.

doYouHaveChildrenThreeOrYounger.title: Do you have children who are three years old or younger?
doYouHaveChildrenThreeOrYounger.heading: Do you have children who are three years old or younger?
doYouHaveChildrenThreeOrYounger.explanation: We need this to work out how much money you should get.

childrenDob.title: Enter your children’s dates of birth
childrenDob.heading: Enter your children’s dates of birth
childrenDob.explanation: Children’s names will not be stored or shared. We need their dates of birth to confirm your identity and to prevent fraud.

areYouPregnant.title: Are you pregnant?
areYouPregnant.heading: Are you pregnant?
areYouPregnant.expectedDeliveryDateText: When is your baby due? You must be at least 10 weeks pregnant.
areYouPregnant.explanation: We need this to work out how much money you should get.

address.title: What’s your address?
address.heading: What’s your address?
address.formDescription: If you claim any benefits you must use the same address registered with the benefits agency (DWP or HMRC).
address.explanation: We need this to confirm your identity and eligibility. We'll send your prepaid card to this address.

phoneNumber.title: What’s your mobile telephone number?
phoneNumber.heading: What’s your mobile telephone number?
phoneNumber.formDescription: If you claim any benefits you must use the same mobile number registered with the benefits agency (DWP or HMRC).
phoneNumber.explanation: We need this to prevent fraud and to contact you about your application if necessary.

emailAddress.title: What’s your email address?
emailAddress.heading: What’s your email address?
emailAddress.formDescription: If you claim any benefits you must use the same email address registered with the benefits agency (DWP or HMRC).
emailAddress.explanation: We need this to send notifications about your application and your prepaid card.

sendCode.title: We’re sending you a code
sendCode.heading: We’re sending you a code
sendCode.hint: Select how you would like to receive it
sendCode.explanation: We need this to confirm your identity and to prevent fraud.

enterCode.title: Enter your code
enterCode.heading: Enter your code
enterCode.weJustSentASixDigitCodeTo: We just sent a 6 digit code to
enterCode.itMayTakeAFewMinutesToArrive: It may take a few minutes to arrive.
enterCode.requestNewCodeLink: Request a new code if it does not arrive

terms-and-conditions.title: Terms and conditions
terms-and-conditions.heading: Terms and conditions
terms-and-conditions.statement: I confirm that I’ve read and will comply with these terms and conditions.

confirm.subTitle: You’re entitled to £{{totalVoucherValue}} a week. Your first payment will be £{{totalVoucherValueForFourWeeks}}.

content.ineligible: You are not on a qualifying benefit
content.error: An error occurred whilst checking your eligibility
content.duplicate: A claim already exists with your details

holding.title: Sorry, the service is unavailable
holding.heading: Sorry, the service is unavailable
holding.useServiceFrom: You will be able to use the service from

pageNotFound.title: Page not found
pageNotFound.heading: Page not found
pageNotFound.checkTypedAddress: If you typed the web address, check it is correct.
pageNotFound.checkPastedAddress: If you pasted the web address, check you copied the entire address.

iLiveInScotland.title: You cannot apply if you live in Scotland
iLiveInScotland.heading: You cannot apply if you live in Scotland
